nav.div: Southwest School Corporation Central Office » District Services » Health Services » Coronavirus Information and Updates

span.span: Southwest School Corporation is committed to the health and safety of our students and staff.
The district follows precautions as recommended by local and state health agencies, and
has a Pandemic and Medical Emergencies Plan in place in the event of a disease outbreak within our schools.

p.span: Please review the following links for up-to-date information.

strong.span: Please click on the following links for updates from SWSC:

strong.style: font-size: medium; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Tahoma;

span.span: eal pick up will be available from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. on the following dates. All pick-ups will be curbside
at the following door locations: SHS door #15, SES and SMS door #23, and Carlisle door #1. Only one meal per student per day is permitted.
